title: FS: A few T206 SGC All Sold
author: AndyG09

posts.post_title: FS: A few T206 SGC All Sold
posts.post_content:
Hello friends. I would like to part ways with the following 206s. Each of these SGC graded 206s are priced including confirmed shipping. Paypal Payment Owed preferred, cash, check, MO all good. Sorry about the so so pics. I still hope Santa is bringing me a scanner this year.....

Willett Piedmont 350 SGC 50 (Super sharp, great colors) Sold
Hallman Piedmont 350 SGC 50 $65 (Almost as nice) SOLD
Lennox Piedmont 350 sold 

Thank you very much for looking!

Best,

Andy
those are nicer than the grades....sweet cards:)

Thanks, Johnny.  Hope all is well with you, friend!

Best,

Andy

Bump for reduction made.

Best,

Andy
Thanks again for the Willett.  When you said "super sharp with great color" you weren't messing around!!

You're very welcome.  Best of luck with your collection!

Ag
